attributes.action: Support employees who have worked throughout the pandemic with a bonus.
attributes.additional_details: Give worker's who can provide evidence that they have worked throughout the pandemic, supporting the public in a beneficial way. A one off bonus would show them how much they have been appreciated by us all.
attributes.background: I feel all worker's need to be acknowledged but shop workers who have worked throughout the pandemic, helping the public and exposing themselves every day to a large number of people have my huge respect. But many say they are tired by the stress of the pandemic. Help them with a bonus & reward

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bonus payments are a decision for employers rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818
